alert.note: Alert for Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 7:14PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Oxford and west central Cumberland Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hiram, or 9 miles west of Naples, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgton, Naples, Hiram, Raymond, Standish, Casco, Limington, Brownfield, Denmark, Sebago and Baldwin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Cumberland Highlands
